name: 2018/11/11 Lunch
description: This low-sodium and healthy recipe makes a perfect lunch for those looking to enjoy a nutritious meal. Comprising pork nilaga, fresh diced cantaloupe, juicy mango chunks, and nutrient-rich chicken livers, it's a delightful mix of flavors and textures that embodies a healthified approach to eating.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: dice the melon, cut the mango into chunks, and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pork nilaga according to your favorite recipe or simply boil until tender, about 45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Simultaneously, boil the chicken livers for about 10 minutes until fully cooked, then set aside to cool before cutting into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked pork nilaga, diced melons, mango chunks, and chicken livers in a bowl. Toss gently to mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
